answers.author: Ali Miller Richards
answers.text:
Absolutely--we recognize the long-time service and ongoing contributions to the profession of retired members through reduced-dues membership options, reduced registration rates for the ICMA Annual Conference, and ongoing opportunities to stay involved such as through member committee and task force service. Please contact our Member & Customer Support Team at 800-745-8780 to reinstate your membership as a Retired member.

author: Mark Palesh
text:
As a retired City/County Manager for six cities in three states, over the last 33 years, I wondered if ICMA had a program to remember members of this career field who have served the public sector.  I have relied on the advice and programs ICMA had to offer, and owe my success to such materials.  
Thanks:
Lt. Col. Mark R. Palesh, USAF (Ret.)
7328 S. Union Creek Way, Apt. 2M
Midvale, Utah 84047
Resume Attached
title: Mark R. Palesh
